channel.title: #129: Driving to Mongolia while running a mission-critical SaaS
channel.description:
Julian Wilde of [Wormly](https://www.wormly.com/) describes how he was able to drive across central Asia – often in countries without easily-available Internet – while running a monitoring SaaS.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/19f705a5-8be0-4f2a-bacc-1dd5aa094534?dark=false"></iframe>
We also reminisce about running a software company before Stripe, AWS and the Digital Nomad phenomenon.
Thanks to EmailToolTester who sponsored this episode. Find which email newsletter service actually reaches your customers with [EmailToolTester’s deliverability report](https://emailtooltester.com/deliver).
You can also [listen to and download this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/2020/03/20/129-driving-to-mongolia-while-running-a-mission-critical-saas/).
